00034  *
00035  * We will use this path to avoid duplicating common files. In order
00036  * to do so, we need to know the path relative to Document Root, since
00037  * that is how it will be accessed over the Web. Should we need a full

00046  *

00048  *  just specify here its relative path to DocumentRoot. We

00050  *  with $serverpath

00056 /**
00057  * Path to the working directories in the local machine starting from /
00058  *
00059  * This must be a directory within the Web server accessible area.
00060  * Typically a directory below the 'htdocs' or $DocumentRoot
00061  *
00062  * We'll use this path to store user data files below into separate
00063  * directories with random names (to make it more difficult to guess)
00064  *
00065  * This directory must be non-browseable (e.g. with a suitable index.html).
00066  *
00067  * @note At EMBnet/CNB we host many servers, each has its own DocumentRoot
00068  *       hanging from /data/www/.
00069  *
00070  * @global string $wd_path
00071  */
00072 $wd_path="$document_root/$httptmp";
